effect.sun_moon: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

short_effect.sun_moon: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.

flavor_text.sun_moon: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
